attributes.action: Referendum to close the Scottish Parliment
attributes.additional_details: Ensure the petition is not blocked by political self interest political party or house of commons staff . The petition would simply allow  a decision. And a binary referendum would do the same . I am concerned you don't want the democratic question to be asked   ?
attributes.background: Facilitate a democratic referendum under the Scotland Act to give Scots a vote to close the Scottish Parliment or keep it open .

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634090
